sentences.en: So and foremost problem to be settled is how to codify and feasible budgetary targets.
sentences.cn: 因此,如何编制切实可行的预算目标就成为首要解决的问题.

sentences.en: The latest draft of the agreement codifies the panel's decision.
sentences.cn: 该协议的最新草案将专家小组的决定编篡成了法规条款。

sentences.en: The noble, Dracon, was asked to codify the laws.
sentences.cn: 贵族德拉古被选为立法者.

sentences.en: We will codify a new technique.
sentences.cn: 我们将引进一种新技术.

words.tran_cn: 编纂，整理；法典编纂；法律汇编

trans.tran_cn: 编纂；将编成法典；编成法典
trans.tran_en: to arrange laws, principles, facts etc in a system

trans.tran_cn: 把（法律）编成法典，编成法典
trans.tran_en: If you codify a set of rules, you define them or present them in a clear and ordered way
